## Static Visualization
```{r load packages}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
require(maps)
require(viridis)

theme_set(theme_void())

```

```{r load data}




```



```{r map1}
states_map <- map_data("state")

ggplot(states_map, aes(long, lat, group = group)) +
  geom_polygon()


```
